short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access over 60,000+ manuals via a widget on your toolbar with the Manuals Hunt extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get quick access to repair and user guides for home appliances, gadgets, electronics, and more. Search by brand or product, download or print, or save for easy referencing later. 

How to use the extension:

1. Click the puzzle icon on the toolbar, then click on the Manuals Hunt icon to access the widget
2. Search for a product or brand manual via the search bar
3. Click ‘View Manual’ to access it

Permission:
Read and modify your data on manualshunt.com: This permission is required to make calls to our API via our domain to provide you with the communicated functionality. 

Want to share feedback? Please fill out this form and help us improve the product for you:
https://manualshunt.com/contactus 

You can uninstall this product at any time. Please follow the instructions here:
https://www.manualshunt.com/uninstall
